definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
branch/stem/stalk/CL:根[gen1]/to block/to hinder/(Tw) interesting, fresh, or amusing subject matter or scenario

sentences.english: Vascular bundles of the pedicel in flower of Commelina communis were scattered within central fundamental tissues.
sentences.chinese: 鸭跖草花梗顶部的维管束分布在中央的基本组织内。

sentences.english: Pedicel erect, to 3 cm, terete, striate.
sentences.chinese: 花梗直立，对3厘米，圆柱状，具条纹。

sentences.english: Pedicel ca. 13 cm at fruiting, only apically sparsely setose.
sentences.chinese: 花梗果时长约13厘米，仅于先端硫被刚毛。

sentences.english: Armpit of capitate only leaf, peduncular and long and thin and flimsy.
sentences.chinese: 头状花序单生叶腋，花梗细长而脆弱。

sentences.english: Rachises , bracts, pedicels, and calyces glandular pilose.
sentences.chinese: 轴，苞，花梗和花萼具腺柔毛。

sentences.english: When dry, remove the flowers from the stalks and set aside.
sentences.chinese: 等花干了以后把花从花梗上取下。

sentences.english: So peduncular did not get force, conduit keeps normal, easy imbibe.
sentences.chinese: 这样花梗没有受到力，导管保持正常，轻易吸收水分。

sentences.english: Boutonniere's pedicel may not be too long.
sentences.chinese: 胸花的花梗也不可太长。

sentences.english: Inflorescences racemose, to 30 cm, pedicels to 5 mm.
sentences.chinese: 总状花序，30厘米长，花梗到5毫米。

sentences.english: Single light-medium blue, three or more per peduncle.
sentences.chinese: 单瓣亮到中蓝色花，每支花梗开3朵或更多的花。

sentences.english: The slender stalks are weighed down with flowers.
sentences.chinese: 纤细的花梗被花儿压弯了。

definition: axillary bud/bud growing from axil of plant
